processingCommand.script:
if "${APRInputFile}"=="" GOTO SKIPSTEP
Echo on
${XT_APPLYPRICERULES} /file ${APRInputFile} /name ${APRConfigName}
Echo off
set retcode=%errorlevel%
echo ApplyPriceRules ended with return code: %retcode%
IF %retcode% EQU 0 GOTO NORMALFLOW
GOTO ERRORFLOW
:NORMALFLOW
set resexe=0
GOTO END
:ERRORFLOW
set resexe=1
GOTO END
:SKIPSTEP
Echo APRInputFile variable not set, step is skipped
set resexe=0
GOTO END
:END
exit %resexe%
